name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices and melted cheese.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese tossed in Caesar dressing.

name: BBQ Chicken Wings
description: Juicy chicken wings coated in tangy BBQ sauce and served with celery sticks.

name: Vegetarian Burger
description: A flavorful vegetarian patty with lettuce, tomato, and avocado on a whole wheat bun.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta with a creamy sauce made of eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

name: Chicken Tenders
description: Breaded and fried chicken tenders served with a side of honey mustard dipping sauce.

name: Marinated Steak
description: Grilled steak marinated in a blend of herbs and spices, served with a side of mashed potatoes.

name: Lemon Sorbet
description: Refreshing lemon sorbet with a tangy flavor, perfect for a light dessert.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with a smooth chocolate ganache.
